name: PAX_JOURNEY_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure of PaxJourneyList, which contains multiple PaxJourney elements. Each PaxJourney has a unique PaxJourneyID, a duration, and a reference to a PaxSegmentID.
prompt: Validate that each <PaxJourney> in <PaxJourneyList> contains a unique <PaxJourneyID>, a <Duration> in ISO 8601 format, and a valid <PaxSegmentRefID>.
